# AFEOL Project ‚Äì Security Credits

This page acknowledges individuals and researchers who contributed to the security and privacy of the AFEOL Project.

AFEOL follows a **privacy-first policy**, meaning contributors may choose to remain anonymous.  
Only researchers who explicitly request acknowledgment will be listed here.

## üîê Anonymous Contributions

AFEOL gratefully recognizes **anonymous and pseudonymous researchers**  
who have responsibly disclosed vulnerabilities or privacy-relevant weaknesses.

Due to project policy, no identifying data is ever stored.

---

## üß≠ Responsible Disclosure Acknowledgment

All listed contributors followed AFEOL‚Äôs responsible disclosure guidance:

- Private encrypted reporting  
- No public disclosure before patch availability  
- No sharing of sensitive data  
- Research aligned with defensive security goals  

---

Thank you to everyone who helps improve the safety, anonymity, and cryptographic integrity of the AFEOL ecosystem.
